name: MR. HAPPY
description:
In MR. HAPPY, you play as a tester for a new and advanced digital assistant named "Mr. Happy".  As you continue testing, you realize that there's a lot more to this happy program than meets the eye.

The choices you pick influence Mr. Happy's behavior and feelings towards you. Your relationship with him and your successes (or failures) will have a drastic impact on the final outcome. Try finding all 6 possible endings!

(This game is recommended to be played on a desktop/laptop for the best experience.)
